content: **crocheted christmas tree coasters in drops paris theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-853 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width = 11½ cm length = 14 cm **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 43 forest green 50 g colour 25 moss green 50 g colour 61 lime one coaster weighs approx 14 g crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 11 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
